posts.message:
Google's self-driving car.
Google Glass.
Project Loon.

all these revolutionary products are not coming from the google we know, they are from a secret Google facility called Google X.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_X

and the thrilling part is the number of Acquisitions made for Google X which indicate that they are working on some exciting projects.

see the list of all google acquisitions from here:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_mergers_and_acquisitions_by_Google

note all the Google X acquisitions starting from #127
posts.caption: en.wikipedia.org
posts.description: Google X, stylized as Google[x],[1] is a semi-secret facility run by Google dedicated to making major technological advancements. It is located about a half mile from Google's corporate headquarters, the Googleplex, in Mountain View, California.[2][3] Work at the lab is overseen by Sergey Brin, one…
